greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of divisors of 4*n.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = 3*sigma(2*n) - 2*sigma(n); the relation is the special case e=1, p=2 of the relation sigma(t^2*n) = (t+1)*sigma(t*n) - t*sigma(n) where t=p^e (p a prime).
G.f. is x times the logarithmic derivative of the g.f. of A182820.
results.author: _Joerg Arndt_, Jul 30 2011
